title: Plat 2 ADC Main LFM/LFT
body:
Hey,

Looking to make/join a MELBOURNE based ranked 5's team, consisting of players between plat 3 and higher. Wanting to make a serious ranked team to rank up, and potentially compete in tournaments at a further date. Hit me up in league (IGN: BigDogJosh) or just leave a comment. Skype will be a requirement because communication is key.
